original: Hañci natthi arahato gihisaṁyojanaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi arahataḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu arahato gihisaṁyojanaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammanti?
analyzed: nanu arahataḥ gihi sayojanam pahīnam ucchinna mūlam tālāvatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhammanti

original: Hañci arahato gihisaṁyojanaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci arahataḥ gihi sayojanam pahīnam ucchinna mūlam tālāvatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhamma no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Atthi koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaroti?
analyzed: atthi koci gihī gihi sayojanam a pahāya diṭṭhe iva dhamme

original: Hañci natthi koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi koci gihī gihi sayojanam a pahāya diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkhassa anta karaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe
nanu vacchagottaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “atthi nu kho, bho gotama, koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassantakaro”ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho gotama koci gihī gihi sayojanam a pahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassa antakaroti

original: “Natthi kho, vaccha, koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassantakaro”ti.
analyzed: natthi kho vaccha koci gihī gihi sayojanam a pahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassa antakaroti

original: Arahā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, methunaṁ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṁ ajjhāvaseyya,
analyzed: arahā methunam dhammam paṭiseveyya methunam uppādeyya putta sambādha sayanam ajjhāvaseyya

original: kāsikacandanaṁ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṁ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṁ sādiyeyya,
analyzed: kāsika candanam pat anubhaveyya mālā gandha vilepanam dhāreyya jātarūpa rajatam sādiyeyya

original: ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya,
analyzed: ajeḷakam paṭiggaṇheyya kukkuṭa sūkaram paṭiggaṇheyya hatthi gavassa vaḷavam paṭiggaṇheyya
tittira vaṭṭaka moraka piñjaram paṭiggaṇheyya citta vaṇḍa vāla moḷim dhāreyya odātāni

original: vatthāni dīghadasāni dhāreyya, yāvajīvaṁ agāriyabhūto assāti?
analyzed: vatthāni dīghadasāni dhāreyya yāvajīvam agāriya bhūtaḥ assa ati

original: Nanu yaso kulaputto, uttiyo gahapati, setu māṇavo, gihibyañjanena arahattaṁ pattoti?
analyzed: nanu yaso kula putto uttiyaḥ gahapati setu māṇavaḥ gihi byañjanena arahattam pattoti

original: Hañci yaso kulaputto, uttiyo gahapati, setu māṇavo, gihibyañjanena arahattaṁ patto, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci yasaḥ kula putto uttiyaḥ gahapati setu māṇavaḥ gihi byañjanena arahattam patto tena vata re vattabbe
